text: The 2019–20 season was Granada CF's 86th season in existence and the club's first season back in the top flight of Spanish football. In addition to the domestic league, Granada participated in this season's edition of the Copa del Rey. The season was slated to cover a period from 1 July 2019 to 30 June 2020. It was extended extraordinarily beyond 30 June due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Reserve team=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== === In === {| class="wikitable"
